channel.title: Biography on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Biography on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Ricky Jay’s Magical Secrets
item.description: Ricky Jay is a legend, and is without a doubt one of my favorite magicians to watch. His shows leave you with a greater appreciation for the magician’s craft, rather than just the immediate illusion they present.

item.title: Pipino: Gentleman Thief — EPIC MAGAZINE — Medium
item.description: Magicians, Mafiosos, a Missing Painting, and the Heist of a Lifetime

item.title: The Rise of the Professional Cyber Athlete
item.description: Very cool profile of Scarlett, a professional StarCraftII player
